医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
2005-2021 年腹部整形术趋势：门诊手术、吸脂术和肝素使用增加根据美国官方医学杂志《整形与重建外科》1 月号的一项新的 16 年分析，腹部整形术仍然是一种安全有效的手术，更多的病例在门诊进行，同时抽脂术的使用也有所增加。整形外科医生协会 (ASPS)。该期刊由威科集团 (Wolters Kluwer) 的 Lippincott 作品集出版。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231225/Abdominoplasty-trends-2005-2021-Increased-out Patient-procedures-liposuction-and-heparin-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231225/Abdominoplasty-trends-2005-2021-Increased-out Patient-procedures-liposuction-and-heparin-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc6d64ed-6b4c-42bf-b80b-f15f70e632e8 Mon, 25 Dec 2023 21:52:34 -0500 Abdominoplasty trends 2005-2021: Increased outpatient procedures, liposuction, and heparin use
狐狸尿液化合物通过多感官激活有效驱除苍蝇农业作物受损和害虫传播病媒疾病已成为当今世界范围内的威胁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231225/Fox-urine-compound- effectively-repels-flies-through-multisensory-activation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231225/Fox-urine-compound- effectively-repels-flies-through-multisensory-activation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ecaa6a3e-ad03-4e23-99e4-0a85f3bc03b6 Mon, 25 Dec 2023 21:45:06 -0500 Fox urine compound effectively repels flies through multisensory activation
研究确定了两种驱动水母触手生长的干细胞类型水母 Cladonema 的大小约为小指指甲大小，可以在两到三天内再生出截断的触手；但如何呢？包括蝾螈和昆虫在内的各种物种的功能组织再生依赖于形成芽基的能力，芽基是一团未分化的细胞，可以修复损伤并长成缺失的附属物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231225/Study-identizes-two-stem-cell-types-driven-jellyfish-tentacle-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231225/Study-identizes-two-stem-cell-types-driven-jellyfish-tentacle-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e27fc03f-6850-4315-b0e9-545a12bc66a3 Mon, 25 Dec 2023 21:30:16 -0500 Study identifies two stem cell types driving jellyfish tentacle growth
简单的邮件技巧使高危患者的肝癌筛查率翻倍宾夕法尼亚大学佩雷​​尔曼医学院的一项新研究显示，当肝硬化患者收到专家签署的命令后，他们的肝癌筛查几乎增加了一倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/Simple-mail-trick-doubles-liver-cancer-screening-rates-for-high-risk-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/Simple-mail-trick-doubles-liver-cancer-screening-rates-for-high-risk-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d288c65-c4ce-423b-87bd-3f0b21dd0f9c Fri, 22 Dec 2023 12:41:00 -0500 Simple mail trick doubles liver cancer screening rates for high-risk patients
柑橘补充剂可以缓解手术后膝盖肿胀和疼痛《骨与关节杂志》上的一项临床试验报告称，对于接受全膝关节置换术 (TKA) 的患者，使用地奥司明（一种从柑橘类水果中提取的类黄酮补充剂）治疗可以减轻膝盖和腿部的肿胀，并减轻相关疼痛。外科手术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/Citrus-supplement-may-ease-knee-swelling-and-pain-after-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/Citrus-supplement-may-ease-knee-swelling-and-pain-after-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82efb1da-6139-428e-befc-edf934fc8cae Fri, 22 Dec 2023 12:25:00 -0500 Citrus supplement may ease knee swelling and pain after surgery
泽西海岸的减肥手术计划获得成人和青少年护理认证在新泽西州寻求肥胖及其相关疾病手术治疗的患者可以选择在符合最高患者安全和质量标准的国家认可计划中接受护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/Jersey-Shores-bariatric-surgery-program-earns-accreditation-for-adult-and-adolescent-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/Jersey-Shores-bariatric-surgery-program-earns-accreditation-for-adult-and-adolescent-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7d7795c-a261-47c1-8e4f-a5b51cf77180 Fri, 22 Dec 2023 12:05:00 -0500 Jersey Shore's bariatric surgery program earns accreditation for adult and adolescent care
空间分析预测骨髓移植后霍奇金淋巴瘤的复发雪松-西奈癌症研究人员发现了一种新方法来预测接受骨髓移植治疗的患者免疫系统癌症是否会复发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/Spatial-profiling-predicts-recurrence-of-Hodgkin-lymphoma-after-bone-marrow-transplant.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/Spatial-profiling-predicts-recurrence-of-Hodgkin-lymphoma-after-bone-marrow-transplant.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9dad6bf4-c6bd-4238-ae62-260c1de9fa99 Fri, 22 Dec 2023 11:55:00 -0500 Spatial profiling predicts recurrence of Hodgkin lymphoma after bone marrow transplant
研究揭示了肌动蛋白的微小调整如何塑造我们的细胞微小的事情很重要——例如，一种氨基酸可以完全改变细胞的结构。哥廷根大学和华威大学的研究人员研究了细胞骨架主要成分的结构和力学：一种称为肌动蛋白的蛋白质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/Study-reveals-how-tiny-tweaks-to-actin-shape-our-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/Study-reveals-how-tiny-tweaks-to-actin-shape-our-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61ad5ce7-402d-461e-9872-3752e8a7a371 Fri, 22 Dec 2023 10:42:00 -0500 Study reveals how tiny tweaks to actin shape our cells
COVID-19 感染数月后在血液中发现脑损伤标志物《自然通讯》今天（2023 年 12 月 22 日）发表的一项新研究详细说明，尽管炎症血液测试正常，但在感染 COVID-19 几个月后，血液中仍存在脑损伤标志物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/Brain-injury-markers-found-in-the-blood-months-after-COVID-19-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/Brain-injury-markers-found-in-the-blood-months-after-COVID-19-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f0c99e0-f561-4b75-ba55-e0ad75753c6f Fri, 22 Dec 2023 10:35:00 -0500 Brain injury markers found in the blood months after COVID-19 infection
新系列聚合物可以杀死细菌而不引起抗生素耐药性抗生素耐药性细菌已成为对公众健康的快速增长的威胁。根据美国疾病控制与预防中心的数据，每年有超过 280 万人被感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/New-family-of-polymers-can-kill-bacteria-without-inducing-antibiotic-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231222/New-family-of-polymers-can-kill-bacteria-without-inducing-antibiotic-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9507d68b-96f0-48c5-a78f-c7b10c61cd41 Fri, 22 Dec 2023 10:28:00 -0500 New family of polymers can kill bacteria without inducing antibiotic resistance
